data.title: Similar companies to InvestorFlow
data.meta_description: Companies like InvestorFlow. Similar companies and competitors including the VentureRadar Innovation and Growth scores, Company Information, Location and more.
data.text:
Nuiku

Privately Held

Founded 2013

USA

Nuiku (pronounced Noo-koo) is a robust, data driven platform and cloud based API that enables seamless natural language processing (NLP) for your product. Here are a few things we work with: CRM (Salesforce, SAP, Blackbaud, Microsoft Dynamics); Apps that consume IoT data (Thermostats, Amazon Echo); Standalone mobile applications; Embedded web applications. Whether you're looking to voice enable CRM (like in the video), business apps or thermostats, Nuiku is the solution for you.

http://www.nuiku.com

PE Front Office

Privately Held

Founded 2013

India

PE Front Office is the only comprehensive and integrated suite of products that has been developed with a focus on the front and middle office processes for alternative investment management – Private Credit/Debt, Private Equity, Venture Capital, Fund of Funds, Real Estate Funds, Limited Partners, and Fund Admins. Our state-of-the-art yet affordable solutions include CRM, Deal Flow, Fundraising, Investment Management (that supports both Equity and Debt), Portfolio Monitoring, Investor Management, Fund Administration, and Investor Portal access. This is further augmented by Risk and Compliance Management, Task and Activities Management, Outlook/Gmail Integration, Mobile App, Document Management, and detailed Reports and Analytics. The PE Front Office solution is available as a cloud-based subscription model and can also be deployed on the client premises. Our software-as-a-service (SaaS) solution is hosted on a fully secure, virtual, private cloud that’s dedicated and exclusive to each customer.

http://pefrontoffice.com/

TRY OUR SIMILAR COMPANIES APP

Find B2B Sales Prospects

Research Competitive Landscapes

Export Lists

Open Now

Weflow

Privately Held

Founded date unknown

Germany

Weflow is a comprehensive revenue platform designed to enhance sales performance by automating data capture, providing insights into deal and pipeline health, and streamlining the forecast process. It offers users the ability to synchronize emails, meetings, and contacts, as well as track field changes, with the aim of improving Salesforce data quality and hygiene. The platform facilitates deal risk analysis, pipeline management, and sales forecasting to improve win rates and quota attainment. Weflow touts a user-friendly interface, quick implementation, and enterprise-grade security, making it a valuable tool for revenue leaders, operations, managers, and account executives seeking to optimize their sales processes and drive predictable revenue growth.

https://www.getweflow.com

Smartsheet

Privately Held

Founded 2005

USA

Smartsheet, a leading Software as a Service (SaaS) company, offers businesses an intuitive collaboration and work management tool. The ease of use of the familiar spreadsheet-like interface, coupled with file sharing, work automation and Gantt chart features, have made it a popular and highly functional collaboration and project management tool. Smartsheet is used by teams across more than 165 countries to organize, plan and execute a broad spectrum of projects and processes, including marketing campaigns, product launches, business operations, events, strategic planning and HR initiatives. Customers include construction companies, consulting firms, schools and universities, utility firms, government entities, healthcare organizations, high-tech firms, non-profits, manufacturing and law firms, among others. Additionally, Smartsheet offers mobile apps, pre-built templates and integrations with leading cloud apps such as Box, Dropbox, Salesforce, Google Drive and Zapier to ensure users are up and running quickly. Visit www.smartsheet.com for more details.

http://www.smartsheet.com

TouchBase

Privately Held

Founded 2013

USA

TouchBase is a new company that builds custom, branded apps for salespeople. Touchbase’s software allows marketers to upload customer facing content such as presentation slides, videos, and PDFs through a back-end content management system so that they can be viewed on the apps without Internet or data connection, while also providing customer engagement analytics. In addition, Touchbase allows its clients to integrate their apps with services like Salesforce and Docusign.

http://www.touchbaseinc.com

FitSprint

Privately Held

Founded 2015

United Kingdom

FitSprint is a bespoke digital platform to empower fitness instructors. FitSprint works to- quickly, easily and affordably, provide instructors with all the digital tools they need to be successful.

http://www.FitSprint.com/

Trusted Twin

Privately Held

Founded date unknown

Poland

Trusted Twin specializes in facilitating secure and compliant data collaboration between partners, without compromising sensitive information. The platform allows users to share and manage operational data, establish trust, and retain ownership and control. It supports seamless integration with multiple systems, enabling the creation of shared objects for business processes and offering an API-first approach. Developers can focus on applications rather than infrastructure, leveraging features like flexible data models, visibility management, and a robust security framework. Trusted Twin's solutions cater to various applications, including real-time recommendations, customer profiling, and data monetization.

https://www.trustedtwin.com

Cloud Elements

Privately Held

Founded 2012

USA

Cloud Elements brings harmony to the world of APIs, allowing software providers to innovate faster and plug into digital ecosystems. The company's one-to-many virtualized API integration platform enables developers to unify thousands of APIs, build common data models for core business functions, and reduce the pain, cost and complexity of integration. Founded in 2012, Cloud Elements is headquartered in Denver, Colo., and serves customers worldwide.

http://www.cloud-elements.com

DealCloud

Privately Held

Founded 2010

USA

DealCloud is a pioneer in M&A Software. The Company was formed in 2010 by a team of former deal professionals with deep knowledge of the private capital markets. DealCloud is the global leader in providing deal management, workflow, and technology solutions to all participants in the private capital markets, including private equity and growth capital firms, sell-side banks, publicly traded companies, and debt capital investors. DealCloud is well known for its client service, takes great pride in the delivery of its configurable SaaS platform, and values the strength of its relationships with clients. The DealCloud team understands the pace of deal execution and is committed to working at the same cadence as its clients to deliver fast and accurate outcomes.

http://www.dealcloud.com

Solvimon

Privately Held

Founded 2022

Netherlands

Solvimon is a company that provides solutions for businesses struggling with the complexities of usage-based pricing strategies. They offer ready-made systems to manage custom sales deals, accurately bill customers, and prevent revenue leakage. Solvimon's services save businesses time, money, and resources by eliminating the need to build internal billing systems. Additionally, they empower companies to optimize their revenue potential through flexible pricing options tailored based on usage and customer requirements.

https://www.solvimon.com/

Litmus Automation

Privately Held

Founded 2014

USA

Litmus Automation enables Industry 4.0 teams to deploy and operate unified Edge to Cloud systems. Our industrial IoT platform allows businesses to securely connect, manage and analyze data from legacy to modern devices or assets.

http://litmusautomation.com/

Resend

Privately Held

Founded date unknown

USA

Resend is an API-focused email platform that enables developers to build, test, and deliver transactional emails at scale. Their offerings include simple integration with SDKs, modular webhooks, and the ability to develop email templates using React. Resend prioritizes deliverability with features like proactive blocklist tracking, managed dedicated IPs, and domain monitoring. They also emphasize security with DNS record verification and DMARC policies to prevent spoofing. The platform is designed to provide a first-class developer experience, aiming to be the go-to solution for companies seeking reliable email infrastructure.

https://www.resend.com

Palantir Technologies

Privately Held

Founded 2004

USA

We’re focused on creating the world’s best user experience for working with data, one that empowers people to ask and answer complex questions without requiring them to master querying languages, statistical modeling, or the command line. To achieve this, we build platforms for integrating, managing, and securing data on top of which we layer applications for fully interactive human-driven, machine-assisted analysis.

http://www.palantir.com/

Candi Controls

Privately Held

Founded 2009

USA

Candi enables businesses and their customers to access everyday devices remotely over the web, for energy management, control and monitoring, and data acquisition. Clients include electric utilities, a global controls company, CE manufacturers, and leading systems integrators. Our extensive library of widgets and drivers makes custom app development quick and affordable. We also provide enterprise- and user-level web services to simplify connectivity, support and analytics for those applications. These include portal hosting, data acquisition and presentation, event and alert relays, and network monitoring. Clients may also optionally use Candi's API to design their own applications. Candi’s customers include Capgemini, San Diego Gas & Electric, the Sacramento Municipal Utility District, and thermostat manufacturer RCS Technology.

http://www.candicontrols.com/

Open Payments

Privately Held

Founded 2017

Sweden

Open Payments Europe provides the groundbreaking market infrastructure required for successful Open Banking. The Open Payments Platform is a PSD2 compliant API aggregation platform that offers a single, open and secure point of access to the diverse bank API networks throughout Europe and also connects partner services like lending, currency and virtual banks. Open Payments simplifies integration of third party application providers, e-commerce platforms and B2B systems.

http://www.openpayments.io

TRY OUR SIMILAR COMPANIES APP

Find B2B Sales Prospects

Research Competitive Landscapes

Export Lists

Open Now

Contactually

Privately Held

Founded 2011

USA

Contactually was founded in 2011 by Zvi Band, Tony Cappaert and Jeff Carbonella. The Washington, D.C.-based technology start-up builds a new marketing channel focusing on managing your most important professional relationships by automatically reminding you to follow up with key contacts. The SaaS platform integrates seamlessly with email, social networks, and CRM tools to keep all of your contacts up-to-date and in sync across your entire network. The team was previously part of the 500 Startups incubator in Mountain View, California. Currently, Contactually supports Gmail, Google Apps, IMAP, and Microsoft Exchange email. POP3 email is compatible with Contactually using the Outlook for Windows plug-in. The service integrates with Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn, as well as with Google Contacts, Salesforce, Highrise, Pipedrive, SugarCRM, MailChimp and Do.com.

http://www.contactually.com

Eltropy

Privately Held

Founded 2013

USA

Eltropy provides a secure and compliant way for you to engage your clients across messaging apps such as iMessage, Messenger, WhatsApp, WeChat, Line, etc. Companies using Eltropy's software see a 300% increase in sales conversions and a >800% increase in client engagement.

http://www.eltropy.com/

CipherCloud

Acquired/Merged (Assumed)

Founded 2010

USA

CipherCloud, the leader in cloud data security, enables companies to adopt the cloud while ensuring data protection, compliance, and control. CipherCloud delivers a comprehensive multi-cloud security platform that integrates advanced data protection, adaptive policy controls, monitoring, cloud risk analysis. The largest financial services, insurance, healthcare, telecommunication and government organizations across more than 25 countries have put their trust in CipherCloud.

http://www.ciphercloud.com

import.io

Privately Held

Founded 2012

United Kingdom

Import.io delivers the world's data directly to enterprises, fueling business insight and competitive advantage. The Import.io highly scalable Web Data Integration solution extracts, prepares and integrates high-quality comprehensive web data into customers' analytics platforms and business applications. The company delivers data to more than 800 enterprise customers from millions of web sources. Headquartered in Los Gatos, Calif., with offices in Denver and London UK, Import.io was founded in 2012.

http://import.io/

Zenoti

Privately Held

Founded 2010

USA

Founded in 2010, Zenoti was launched to provide an all-in-one business management solution for the spa and salon industry, notoriously plagued by a lack of software robust enough to support the entire business eco-system of operational tasks. Founders, Sudheer and Dheeraj Koneru, experienced first-hand the difficulties in running a chain of spa, salon and fitness centers and reached back to their roots in enterprise software to build a powerful, cloud-based solution that was simple and easy to use. Today, the Zenoti platform is engineered for reliability and scale, and using enterprise-level technology made available to businesses of all sizes from the single location brand to chains with over 600 outlets. Zenoti currently powers thousands of spas and salons in over 30 countries. Zenoti affords the ability to seamlessly manage every aspect of a business from online appointment bookings, to billing through a POS, CRM, inventory management, marketing automation, and more. Zenoti's clients are able to expand revenue through the platform by elevating the customer experience, increasing customer retention and spend, as well as ease operational overhead through automation. The company is headquartered in Seattle, USA and has 7 offices globally, in the cities of Seattle, Sydney, Jakarta, Kuala Lampur, Manila, Hyderabad, and Dubai. The company has received $6 million in funding from Accel Partners. http://www.zenoti.com/

http://www.zenoti.com/

EquityZen

Privately Held

Founded 2013

USA

EquityZen connects shareholders of private companies with investors seeking alternative investments. Our mission is to improve the way startup employees are paid by unlocking the value of their equity compensation in a way that benefits all key players: the shareholder, the company, and the investor. Investors that previously couldn't access late-stage private companies due to investment minimums, can now invest in private growth companies.

http://equityzen.com

Redpanda

Privately Held

Founded 2019

USA

Redpanda is a streaming data platform for developers. Built from the ground up with a native Kafka API, the system is engineered to eliminate complexity, maximize performance, and reduce costs for companies like Activision, Texas Instruments, Midjourney, StoneX, Cisco, Lacework, Optimizely, Vodafone, Moody’s, Jump Trading and NCR, who use it to push terabytes of streaming data a day through their applications and services.

https://redpanda.com/

Aleph Alpha

Privately Held

Founded 2019

Germany

Aleph Alpha was founded in 2019 with the mission to research and build the foundational technology for an era of strong AI. The team of international scientists, engineers, and innovators researches, develops, and deploys transformative AI like large language and multimodal models and runs the fastest European commercial AI cluster. Its generative AI solutions are the prime choice for enterprises and governmental institutions seeking to retain independence, secure their data, and build trustworthy solutions.

https://www.aleph-alpha.com/
